# Preamble

## Introduction

## Dependencies

```{r load-libs, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(miro)
library(OSTA.data)
library(SpatialExperiment)
library(SpatialExperimentIO)
```

```{r load-data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# retrieve Xenium dataset
id <- "Xenium_HumanColon_Oliveria"
pa <- OSTA.data_load(id)
dir.create(td <- tempfile())
unzip(pa, exdir=td)
(spe <- readXeniumSXE(td))
# crop for demo
xy <- spatialCoords(spe)
sub1 <- spe[, 
    xy[,1]>1000 & xy[,1]<2000 & 
    xy[,2]>1500 & xy[,2]<2500 ]
sub2 <- spe[, 
    xy[,1]>1400 & xy[,1]<1600 & 
    xy[,2]>1800 & xy[,2]<2000 ]
p <- "cell_boundaries"
m <- "transcripts"
```

# Centroids

```{r fig.width=4, fig.height=3.5}
miro(spe, dat_aes=list(stroke=0, size=0.2, col="total_counts"), dat_t=log10)
```

# Polygons

```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=4.5}
miro(sub1, pol=p, pol_aes=list(fill="cell_area"))
```

# Molecules

```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=4.5}
miro(sub1, mol=m, keys=c("DUOX2", "MUC12", "VWF"), mol_aes=list(size=0))
```

# Layering

```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=4.5}
miro(sub2, 
    pol=p, pol_aes=list(fill=NA, col="black", size=0.1),
    mol=m, mol_aes=list(size=0.1), 
    keys=c("DUOX2", "VWF", "MZB1"),
    mol_pal=c("magenta", "blue", "gold"))
```
